TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to edit Value Conversion CBA Configuration.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Value Conversion Configuration Tab.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on Value Conversion Configuration Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on Value Conversion Configuration Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on Value Conversion Configuration Tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter gdp deflator value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter gdp deflator value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter gdp deflator value.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter gdp growth value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter gdp growth value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter gdp growth value.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Save button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that user is able to edit Value Conversion CBA Configuration.Capture screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to edit Value Conversion CBA Configuration.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to edit Value Conversion CBA Configuration.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to edit Value Conversion CBA Configuration.
